BR.name: Aqua Moto Racing 3D™
BR.description: É o Aqua Moto Racing 3D! Sinta a emoção das potentes embarcações e manobras inacreditáveis em três dimensões. Passe por oceanos e praias oníricas nos trópicos, na Grécia e no Egito. Execute manobras insanas e desvie de boias para carregar seu turbo e passar na frente dos seus adversários. Ganhe dinheiro participando de corridas e gaste-o em embarcações melhores. Desbloqueie novos campeonatos e conquistas na sua jornada em se tornar uma lenda. Jogue contra seus amigos no modo multijogador local. Prepare-se para a melhor onda da sua vida!

CA.name: Aqua Moto Racing 3D™
CA.description: It's Aqua Moto Racing 3D! Experience the thrill of high-powered watercraft and break-neck stunts in a third dimension. Race through heaving oceans along sandy beaches in the Tropics, Greece and Egypt. Perform insane stunts and go around the buoys closely to charge your turbo and get the edge against your opponents. Earn cash by participating in races and spend it on better watercraft. Unlock new Championships and Achievements on your quest for Legendary Status. Compete against your friends in local multiplayer mode. Get Ready For The Wave Ride Of Your Life!

MX.name: Aqua Moto Racing 3D™
MX.description: ¡Es Aqua Moto Racing 3D! Vive la emoción de manejar poderosas embarcaciones y realizar piruetas vertiginosas en una tercera dimensión. Ábrete camino a través de océanos agitados y playas hermosas en el Trópico, Grecia y Egipto. Realiza piruetas descabelladas y pasa cerca de las boyas para cargar tu turbo y tener ventaja sobre tus adversarios. Participa en carreras, consigue dinero y úsalo para comprar mejores embarcaciones. Desbloquea nuevos Campeonatos y Logros en tu búsqueda del Estado de Legendario. Compite contra tus amigos en el modo multijugador local. ¡Prepárate para montar olas como nunca antes en tu vida!

US.description: It's Aqua Moto Racing 3D! Experience the thrill of high-powered watercraft and break-neck stunts in a third dimension. Race through heaving oceans along sandy beaches in the Tropics, Greece and Egypt. Perform insane stunts and go around the buoys closely to charge your turbo and get the edge against your opponents. Earn cash by participating in races and spend it on better watercraft. Unlock new Championships and Achievements on your quest for Legendary Status. Compete against your friends in local multiplayer mode. Get Ready For The Wave Ride Of Your Life!
